title: Recommend KPIs for a New Strategy
description: A client is launching a new strategy focused on 'customer centricity'. An agent must recommend relevant KPIs to track its success.

tasks.description: Analyze the 'customer centricity' strategy to understand its core goals.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies goals like 'improve satisfaction' and 'reduce churn'.

tasks.description: Brainstorm a list of potential KPIs relevant to the strategy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of relevant KPIs.

tasks.description: Recommend the top 5 most impactful KPIs, such as 'Net Promoter Score (NPS)', 'Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)', and 'Churn Rate'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a concise and relevant list of recommended KPIs.
